results.code:
159     @staticmethod
160     def verify_token(token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> dict[str, Any]:
161         """验证令牌"""
162         try:
163             payload = jwt.decode(token, JWT_SECRET_KEY, algorithms=[JWT_ALGORITHM])
164 
165             # 检查令牌类型
166             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
167                 raise HTTPException(
168                     status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED, detail="无效的令牌类型"
169                 )
170 
171             # 检查过期时间
172             exp = payload.get("exp")
173             if exp is None or datetime.fromtimestamp(exp, UTC) < datetime.now(UTC):
174                 raise HTTPException(
175                     status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED, detail="令牌已过期"
176                 )
177 
178             return payload
179 
180         except jwt.ExpiredSignatureError:
181             raise HTTPException(
182                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED, detail="令牌已过期"
183             ) from None
184         except jwt.JWTError:
185             raise HTTPException(
186                 status_code=status.HTTP_401_UNAUTHORIZED, detail="无效的令牌"
187             ) from None
188
results.issue_text: Possible hardcoded password: 'access'
